Detailed Description

em>SmsProvider is the base provider of all sms providers. It allows retrieving pdus from and changing the state of the pdus on the sim. It presents all sms within the system. An instance of this class is part of the Apoxi Data Control. A pointer to this provider can be retrieved from the main provider via the id:

c_sms_provider_id

Following column ids are defined: c_sms_recno_id :NumberType: c_sms_pos_id :NumberType: return the effective position on sim or nvram c_sms_status_id :NumberType: return Tpdu::Status enum c_sms_string_id :WStringType: c_sms_phonenumber_id :PhoneNumberType: c_sms_dcs_id :NumberType: return DataCodingScheme value c_sms_msg_class_id :NumberType: return DataCodingScheme::MessageClass enum c_sms_msg_type_id :NumberType: return MessageTypeIndicator::Type enum c_sms_coding_group_id :NumberType: return DataCodingScheme::GroupId enum c_sms_datetime_id :DateTimeType: c_sms_date_id :DateType: c_sms_time_id :TimeType: c_sms_pdu_data_id :GenericType: c_sms_compound_sms_id :GenericType: cast the generic object to SmsCompoundItem c_sms_message_status_id :NumberType: use ShortMessageStatus class for wrapping c_sms_conc_status_id :NumberType: return ConcatenetedStatus enumeration c_sms_refno_id :NumberType: return message reference number c_sms_storage_media_id :NumberType: returns the Sms::StorageType c_sms_protid_id :NumberType: returns the Protocolidentifier c_sms_sca_id :PhoneNumberType: returns the service center address c_sms_reply_path_flag_id :NumberType: cast to BOOLEAN c_sms_conc_tpdu_num_id :NumberType: returns the number of pdus of a conc. SMS c_sms_no_pdu_sim_id :NumberType: returns the number of pdus on Sim c_sms_no_pdu_flash_id :NumberType: returns the number of pdus in Flash c_sms_header_text_id :WStringType: returns the header text of MO-SMS

BOOLEAN SmsProvider::CopyTo (  INT  row,
const Sms::StorageType  type,
ProtocolIdentifier  pid,
INT &  src_row,
INT &  dst_row
) 
 

performs copying of MOSMS & MTSMS to desired storage media (SIM/FLASH) and allows implicit change of PID for copied SMS

Parameters:
row input parameter for row to copy
type input parameter for desired storage media type
in input parameter that specifies the new PID for copied row
src_row output parameter for getting position of source row (differs from original row in case of change during store procedure)
dst_row output parameter for getting destination position of copied row

BOOLEAN SmsProvider::CopyTo (  INT  row,
const Sms::StorageType  type,
INT &  src_row,
INT &  dst_row
) 
 

performs copying of MOSMS & MTSMS to desired storage media (SIM/FLASH)

BOOLEAN SmsProvider::DeleteAllSms (  SmsDeleteStatus  criteriamask,
BOOLEAN  smsreports = FALSE
)  [inline]
 

deletes sms which fullfill the criteriamask, the deletion of smsreports or sms can be controlled via the smsreports flag. provider must be casted to SmsProvider to use that interface. The enumeration SmsDeleteStatus is defined in SimPduHandler.hpp
